title: Ghost of Tsushima on PC?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.22.21
description:
Download the DoorDash app in the App Store and use code GAMES2021 or GAMESCA (if you’re in Canada) to get 25% off and free delivery on your first order!

Go to http://canva.me/kfgd to get your FREE 45-day extended trial!

Go to http://sqex.link/remakeKFGD to Buy FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE for Playstation 5 today.

G4's Ovilee May joins Greg to talk Ghost of Tsushima on PC rumors, Superman game rumors, and more! Follow Ovilee: https://twitter.com/OvileeMay

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is LIVE right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services. Why’s it special? Well, let’s just say we announce a new host!
Gamescast posts Thursday!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:26 - Ghost of Tsushima on PC? Kenneth Shepard @ Fanbyte
00:12:15 - Do you think we will get this news in another PlayStation Blog? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:13:10 - PAX West LIVES! Cheap Ass Gamer on Twitter
00:20:00 - BREAKING NEWS: LETS GOOOO!! I’m excited to announce that I’ll be hosting EA Play Live! You all better tune in July 22 at 10AM PT/1PM ET and follow 
@EA for allllll the latest updates
00:20:55 - More Abandoned Craziness
00:29:30 -  Ad 
00:34:20 - WB Montreal Working on a Superman Game? Rebecca Smith @ PS Lifestyle
00:41:40 - Avengers is Showing Users IP Addys, Paul Tassi @ Forbes
00:48:13 - Tekken x Street Fighter Might Live yet, Ian Walker @ Kotaku
00:51:55 - Pesky Switch Firmware Fixed, Wesley LeBlanc @ IGN
00:53:03 - Kim Swift Lands at Xbox, RV @ IGN
00:57:12 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
01:01:00 - Segment Idea - Madeline (mad exposure)
01:01:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
